data.title: Today, we honour and celebrate the incredible legacy of Rabindranath Tagore, a true great who was born on this day 163 years ago in...
data.meta_description:
7,396 likes, 51 comments - nobelprize_org on May 6, 2024: "Today, we honour and celebrate the incredible legacy of Rabindranath Tagore, a true great who was born on this day 163 years ago in Calcutta, India. 

The first non-European literature laureate, he was awarded the Nobel Prize "because of his profoundly sensitive, fresh and beautiful verse, by which, with consummate skill, he has made his poetic thought, expressed in his own English words, a part of the literature of the West." His words still have the power to inspire us today. 

#nobelprize #literature".
